snippet: Fuzzy Levane, who died Monday at 92, was the Knicks' coach in 1958 when he hired Red Holzman as a team scout. Holzman, who coached them to their only championships, in 1970 and 1973.
abstract: Fuzzy Levane, who died Monday at 92, was the Knicks' coach in 1958 when he hired Red Holzman as a team scout. Holzman, who coached them to their only championships, in 1970 and 1973.

headline.main: Farewell to a Friendly Figure From the Knicks' Past
